title: Gucurbita-Calbasse I
credit_line: Patrons Art Fund: gift of Mr. and Mrs. George Magee Wyckoff
provenance_text:
Jochen Hiltmann [b. 1935], DÃ¼sseldorf, Germany [1]; purchased from the artist by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961.

Notes:
[1]. The sculpture was included (no. 159, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. 
[2]. The sculpture was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International as a gift of Mr. and Mrs. George Magee Wyckoff, Sewickley, PA. It was accessioned on October 17, 1961.
